column4: hey there. intrepid is supported til april 2010, right? -- what about security updates? do they update major bugs in servers, such as tomcat6 ?
if you want LTS - Long Term Support stick to Hardy for now
you will find what you are looking for here https://launchpad.net/%7Emjeanson/+archive/backports/+sourcepub/571110/+listing-archive-extra
